name: Hotel Allegra

reviews.text: Hotel Allegra is a great airport hotel located about 10 mins from the Zurich Airport. The Kloten train station is literally right next to the hotel and you can take a 15 min train ride to Zurich HB, the center of the city. Kloten is a rather quiet part of the city, but if you take the underpass to the other side of the train station, you'll find a variety of restaurants and shops to pass the day. There is also a convenient supermarket right across the street from the hotel. Hotel staff were friendly, rooms were clean and full of amenities, and it was great value for 100 CHF (considering that most other hotels go for 150 CHF+).
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: The only downside is that housekeeping barged into my room 3 times in a day without knocking. This was a bit awkward as one of the times, I had just gotten out of the shower. For the sake of future guests, please knock and announce yourself before swinging the door open!
reviews.title: Just as described; great for airport connection

reviews.text: All in all, great value hotel and perfect layover option.
reviews.title: Good airport Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is very good if you have to get to the airport early and conveniently. Checked-in mid afternoon and had to wait until 6pm to order a meal via room service. There is a Spar (convenience store) across the road though so easy to pick up a snack. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Had a very early start so can't comment on the breakfast.
reviews.title: its a great location to reach airport

reviews.text: Stayed one night after a recent ski trip due to early flight out of Zurich. All worked well. Efficient check in. Pleasant restaurant with good food and good choice of wines by the glass. Rooms very comfortable and a good size. Decor not to my taste but that's a personal view. They were clean and well maintained. Airport transfers efficient. So it does exactly what you want from an airport hotel.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel near the Airport zurich

reviews.text: Nice hotel with friendly staff. The hotel is not in the city center, but the train right outside takes you there. And doesn't make noise outside the hotel. Typically a business hotel for the closeness to the airport, but still a warm and friendly hotel for non-business travelers. I didn't have the breakfast since it was not included in the room price (that annoys me). But, there is a Spar just across the street, so I bought my breakfast there.
reviews.title: Spacious and nice room - train as neighbour

reviews.text: If you need internet service I suggest you go elsewhere. I travel about 100 days a year, and, as many of us, need a good internet service, which this place does definitely not offer. The breakfast has 2 options, check them out and make your choice. Neither one is particularly exiting.
reviews.title: Very poor internet service

reviews.text: Kind of a grimy room. Hairs on the bed that def didn't belong to my husband or myself. Carpet had stains all over it which made me desperately wish I had slippers or something walk in. No fridge. Did have a hot water kettle though. It's only redeeming quality- it is a less than 10 minute shuttle to the airport. Husband and I stayed for 2 nights knowing our flight was leaving at 9 am so we needed to be as close as possible. It accomplished that but not much else. Other positives- a supermarket across the street to grab fruits/bread for breakfast. Overall, I wouldn't call it awful but I would also say know what you're getting for this price/location.
reviews.title: Near to airport, not much else

reviews.text: This is a bit further from downtown Zurich, but close to train station. The hotel is nice: clearn room, well maintained facility, mordern style room & building. We're from Korea and arrived hotel late at night. But the front desk was kind and provided us well service. With small walking, there was good cafe, and small shopping center. Nice place to stay.
reviews.title: Good place to stay at Zurich

reviews.text: It was my first visit to this hotel and I was traveling with my family, plus me it was 5 of us. We got our reservations done prior and whilst doing that, they were very helpful and for the first time in my traveling history have I received a room with five single beds. Even after that, there was still enough space for us to move around. The surrounding is very quiet and there is a grocery store closeby (walking distance) which was great because when you don't want to eat the hotel's food, you have other options available. The Kloten train station is literally right next to the hotel and I could see it from my room. It was a total value for money! Don't doubt it, just go for it!
reviews.title: Overall It Was AWESOME!

reviews.text: We chose the Hotel due to its proximity to the Zurich airport.
reviews.title: Typical Swiss efficiency

reviews.text: Quite efficient and to the point. The staffs handled our checkin and check out professionally.
reviews.title: Great Service

reviews.title: Superb Location – Acceptable Accommodations

description: The Allegra hotel is situated in a central yet quiet location, close to the Zurich airport, next to the Kloten train station. It offers you a free airport shuttle and free internet in all rooms.You enjoy free access to Kloten's public swimming pool and you will find a complimentary bottle of water on your room upon arrival.You can park your car for free on site during your stay. At an additional cost you can also leave your car at the hotel's parking lot during your business trip or vacation.Only 5 minutes away from Zurich Airport and 15 minutes from the center of Zürich, the Allegra hotel is a convenient place to stay.
